item.title: CVE-2024-27974|2024-03-18T07:59:37.720Z -- FUJIFILM Business Inovation Corp. -- DocuPrint P450 d
item.description: Cross-site request forgery vulnerability in FUJIFILM printers which implement CentreWare Internet Services or Internet Services allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to alter user information. In the case the user is an administrator, the settings such as the administrator's ID, password, etc. may be altered. As for the details of affected product names, model numbers, and versions, refer to the information provided by the vendor listed under [References].
